name: Santa's Rush
description:
Bring Christmas joy as fast as you can! Help Santa deliver all his presents to three different-sized villages as quickly as possible!

Made for 32bit Holiday Jam 2021

Assets (All Free from the Unity Asset Store)

  • Low Poly Christmas add-on by Eclypso
  • Low Poly Winter Pack by Broken Vector
  • Simple Collectibles Pack by Dillon Wallace
  • Christmas Music - Loop Instrumental by DC_Assets_UY
  • Coral & White simple UI by cione
  • Low Poly Houses Pack by Amaru Vera
  • LowPoly Fantasy Bags by Vergis

Sound Effects (All Free from Free Sounds Library)

  • Santa Arriving Sound Effect by SPANAC
  • Winning Bell Melody Sound Effect by SPANAC
  • Ding Sound Effect by SPANAC
  • Single Ding Sound Effect by SPANAC

Fonts (All Free from Font Space)

  • For Christmas Font by jadatype
  • Christmas Snow Font by Jonathan S. Harris
  • Candy Cane Font by JoannaVu
